block.blockname: Initalize and configure the network analyzer Keysight E5071C

step.stepname: Initialize Keysight network analyzer E5071C, and open the connection.
step.stepdescription: Intialize Keysight E5071C, and open the connection over Ethernet cable.

step.stepname: Preset the network analyzer
Configure the channel display mode
step.stepdescription: Select the window layout for the network analyzer front panel.

step.stepname: Allocate 1 traces for channel 1.
Configure the trace graph layout for channel 1.
Setup the trace S-Parameter and data format for Channel1.Trace1
Allocate 1 traces for channel 2.
Configure trace graph layout for channel 2.
Setup the trace S-Parameter and data format for Channel2.Trace1
Setup the sweep frequency range for Channel1.Trace1
Max Channel1.Trace1 ON display
Set up the sweep frequency range for channel2.Trace1
Configure the trace display scale for Channel2.Trace1

block.blockname: Set up the test limits and mask line

step.stepname: Change the channel display layout
Maximize the window 2.
Change the sweep frequency range for channel 2.
Perform target marker search, plot the mask line
Enable the limit test feature, and show PASS/FAIL indicator on the screen
Save the mask limit line into the local disk
Clean up the mask limit line
Load the mask limit line from .csv file in local disk
Query the final conclusion of limit test.

block.blockname: Measure the frequencies at target marker positions

step.stepname: Change the window layout to separate the trace in multiple channels.
Hide the right-hand menu
step.stepdescription: Display OFF the soft key to enlarge the window size.

step.stepname: Clear the mask limit line for channel 2.
Remove the existed old marker in channel 1.
Remove the existed old marker in channel 2.
Configure the trace mode for channel 1.
Configure the trace graph in Channel 1
Select the trace S-Parameter and data format
Setup the sweep frequency range for channel 1.
Configure the trace display scale for Channel1.Trace1
Open the marker search mode
step.stepdescription: Display ON the marker 1 on Channel1.Trace1.

step.stepname: Specify the target for marker search
step.stepdescription: Target value : -10.0dB, data format : Log Magnitude

step.stepname: Turn ON the marker search tracking feature
Perform marker search
Retrieve the frequency value at marker position in channel1.trace1
step.stepdescription: After performed target marker search, search the target level : -10dB

step.stepname: Configure the trace mode for channel 2.
Configure the trace graph in channel 2.
Select the trace S-Parameter and format for channel2.trace1
Set-up the sweep frequency range for channel 2.
Configure the trace display scale for channel2.trace1
Enable the marker search mode
Specify the target value for marker search
Enable the marker search tracking feature
Perform the target marker search
Retrieve the frequency value at marker position in channel2.trace1
Configure the trace mode for channel 3.
Configure the trace graph layout in channel 3.
Select the trace S-Parameter and format
Setup the sweep frequency range for channel 3.
Configure the trace display scale for channel3.trace1
Open the marker search mode
Specify the target value for marker search
Enable the marker search tracking feature
Perform the target marker search
Retrieve the frequency value at marker position in channel3.trace1
Configure the trace mode for channel 4.
Configure the trace graph layout in channel 4.
Select the trace S-Parameter and format
Setup the sweep frequency range for channel 4.
Configure the trace display scale for channel4.trace1
Open the target marker search mode
Specify the target value for marker search
Enable the marker search tracking feature
Perform the target marker search
Measure the frequency value at marker position in channel4.trace1

Configure the trace graphy layout in channel 5
Select the S-Parameter and format
Setup the sweep frequency range for channel 5.
Configure the trace display scale for channel5.trace1
Enable the target marker search mode
Specify the target value for marker search
